titles.title: Protect Children from Dangerous Lighters Act of 2008
Protect Children from Dangerous Lighters Act of 2008
A bill to prohibit the introduction or delivery for introduction into interstate commerce of novelty lighters, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

bill.summary: Protect Children from Dangerous Lighters Act of 2008 - Treats certain novelty lighters as banned hazardous substances under the Federal Hazardous Substances Act, and applies to them the Act's prohibitions (in effect banning their introduction or delivery for introduction into interstate commerce).
